definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4
containing_words.word: 中国人民政治协商会议

definition: Zunyi conference of January 1935 before the Long March

pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Hui4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1
Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

definition: general congress/meeting of the whole committee
consultative conference (political venue during early communist rule)/consultative meeting/deliberative assembly
to call a conference/to convene a meeting
chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress

sentences.english: Afghanistan's Second Vice President Abdul Karim Khalili was present at the meeting as guest of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗第二副总统哈利利作为东道国客人出席会议。

sentences.english: See it when I was in a two day off-site meeting for the team.
sentences.chinese: 我在一个为期两天小组会议的场外看到的风景。

sentences.english: You remember, she was at the meeting last week.
sentences.chinese: 记好了，上周会议她就在。

sentences.english: We have held these meetings at an important time.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一个重要时刻召开这次会议。

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 这位国会议员擅长在公众集会上驳倒诘难者。

sentences.english: Japan is hosting the meeting of delegates from the so-called G8, or group of eight industrialized nations.
sentences.chinese: 日本主持了八国集团代表会议。

sentences.english: A document from their meeting said the situation in Afghanistan is deteriorating.
sentences.chinese: 外长会议的一份文件说阿富汗的局势正在恶化。

sentences.english: The 3-day conference will be held as usual in parallel with the PCIM Exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 像往常一样3天的会议将与PCIM展会一起进行。

sentences.english: Muammar al-Qaddafi, making his first appearance despite 40 years in power.
sentences.chinese: 这也是卡扎菲执政40年来首次参加联大会议。

sentences.english: My transition team held videoconferences with each regional office.
sentences.chinese: 我的过渡小组与每个区域办事处举办了视频会议。

sentences.english: At the next meeting, there was a9)split in the club membership.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的会议里，俱乐部成员之间出现了意见分歧。

sentences.english: NO15, It was a long, drawn-out meeting.
The turbulent meeting ended in a fist fight.
sentences.chinese: 吵闹的会议最终以拳脚相向而结束。

sentences.english: The meeting was brought to a climax by the appearance on the platform of the rebel leader.
sentences.chinese: 起义军的领袖出现在台上时会议达到了高潮。

sentences.english: Let us suppose that you have been asked to introduce the main speaker at a meeting.
sentences.chinese: 让我们假设你被要求在会议上介绍主讲者。

sentences.english: No such meeting has been confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚未确认会有这样一个会议。

definition: to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
to call a conference/to convene a meeting
general congress/meeting of the whole committee
consultative conference (political venue during early communist rule)/consultative meeting/deliberative assembly
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
